flashcards.kikuyu: Gũtema na kanua ti gũtema na rũhĩũ
flashcards.english: To slander is not like cutting with a knife
flashcards.context: Traditional wisdom about words vs actions
flashcards.cultural_notes: Cautions against the destructive power of words and slander, implying damage can be worse than physical cuts

sub_translations.english: is not like cutting with a knife

flashcards.english: Staying home too much is bad
flashcards.cultural_notes: Encourages productivity and active participation in life outside the home
